oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mary Frances Brandon oral history
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Brandon, Mary Frances
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Watson, Cory, interviewer; Williams, James, interviewer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Excerpts of an oral history with Mary Frances Brandon, a kindergarten student at Campus School. Brandon shares memories of her campus experiences as a young child and of the Second Army of Tennessee maneuvers
1. Brandon's experiences as kindergartner at MTSNS -- 2. Second Army of Tennessee maneuvers.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Kindergarten; Middle Tennessee State Normal School. Campus School; Military maneuvers; World War, 1939-1945; Middle Tennessee State Normal School; Middle Tennessee State Teachers College; Middle Tennessee State College
